ROW.NAME: 有电力数据无缴税申报企业明细报表
税管员
ROW.SQLWHE: deptid like (select decode(scope,'ALL','%',substr('[%SYS_DEPTID]',0,7 )||'%') from v_depts where id='[%SYS_DEPTID]') order by name

ROW.DATDSC: select flag,rownum rn, (select nvl(shxydm,id) from tax_company cp where cp.id=t.id) id, name,town,eleqty,elemny,taxman, (select name from v_swjg sw where sw.id=substr(swjg,0,7)) swjg from ( select '' flag,a.id,a.name,a.town,sum(nvl(a.eleqty,0)) eleqty, sum(nvl(a.elemny,0)) elemny,max(a.taxman) taxman,max(swjg) swjg from ( select a.yymm,b.djxh,b.id,b.name,a.town,a.eleqty,a.elemny, nvl(d.name,'--') taxman,b.swjg_dm swjg --e.shtname swjg from tax_eledata a,tax_company b,tax_cmpammno c,v_tax_taxman d --,v_tax_dm_swjg e where a.yymm>=decode('[%YYMM1]','','1900-01','[%YYMM1]') and a.yymm<=decode('[%YYMM2]','','2900-01','[%YYMM2]') and b.taxman like '%[%TAXMAN]%' [%SWJGSTR] [%GDSSTR] and a.usrid=c.ammno and b.id=c.cmid and b.taxman=d.id(+) and b.stat like '[%NSRZT]%' ) a,( select * from tax_taxdata where yymm>=decode('[%YYMM1]','','1900-01','[%YYMM1]') and yymm<=decode('[%YYMM2]','','2900-01','[%YYMM2]') ) b where a.djxh=b.djxh(+) --a.id=b.id(+) and b.id is null and eleqty !=0 and eleqty between decode('[%ELEQTY1]','',0,'[%ELEQTY1]') AND decode('[%ELEQTY2]','',90000000000,'[%ELEQTY2]') and (a.id like '%[%CMID]%' or a.name like '%[%CMID]%') group by a.id,a.name,a.town order by swjg,eleqty desc ) t
select name from tax_company where id like '[%CORPID]'

select id 编号,name 企业名称 ,eleqty 用电量,taxman 税管员, '<a href="ROOT_GXPG/show.sp?grdid=TAX_planstat" target=_blank>处理</a>' 操作 from( select a.id id,a.name name,sum(nvl(a.eleqty,0)) eleqty,max(a.taxman) taxman from (select a.yymm,b.id,b.name,a.eleqty,b.taxman from tax_eledata a,tax_company b where a.usrid=b.ammno) a, (select * from tax_taxdata) b where a.id=b.id(+) and a.yymm=b.yymm(+) and b.id is null and eleqty !=0 group by a.id,a.name order by eleqty desc )
select fxjb from FXJK_ITEM where flbh='0001'
